text: Dascillidae is a family of soft-bodied plant beetles in the order Coleoptera. There are at least 15 genera and about 80 described species in Dascillidae. ITIS Taxonomic notes: *Lawrence and Newton (1995) give the authorship for this family as 'Guérin Méneville, 1843 (1834)'. ==Selected Genera== * Anorus LeConte, 1859 * Dascillus Latreille, 1796 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * * * * * * Category:Polyphaga Category:Beetle families
title: Dascillidae
